worshipHymnList.hymn3: Only One God We’re to Worship
worshipHymnList.hymn4: We Children Of Kingdom of God
worshipHymnList.hymn7: This day indeed is a great day
worshipHymnList.hymn9: Holy Father Son Holy Ghost we worship
worshipHymnList.hymn10: Oh How beautiful are thy courts above
worshipHymnList.hymn11: All ends of earth shall remember
worshipHymnList.hymn12: Lift up your heads oh ye gates
worshipHymnList.hymn13: We give glory Honour and praise
worshipHymnList.hymn14: How beautiful is thy throne in heaven

verses.verse1: 1. Holy, Holy, Holy, Lord God Almighty,
verses.verse3: Thou which was and which is,
verses.verse4: And thou which is to come,
verses.verse5: Thou Father and Son, and Holy Spirit.   (Rev 4:8)
verses.verse6: 2. Holy Holy Holy, O Lord Thou art worthy
verses.verse7: To receive all glory and honour and power
verses.verse8: For only thou hath cre-ated heaven and earth
verses.verse9: For thy pleasure they are and were created. (Rev4:11)
verses.verse10: 3. Holy Holy Holy, Ascribe ye blessing
verses.verse11: And Majesty, glory and honour and power
verses.verse12: Unto Him that sitteth on the throne of glory
verses.verse13: And unto the Lamb for- ever and ever. (Rev 5:11)
verses.verse14: 4. Holy, Holy, Holy, Mighty and Marvelous,
verses.verse15: Are all thy works Lord God Olutanmole
verses.verse16: Righteousness and faithful-ness are all thy ways
verses.verse17: Thou Almighty God king of all ages. (Rev. 15:3)
